Header: 2,000 Tamil and Muslim youth to be recruited to the Police
Content: The Police Department has taken measures to recruit 2,000 Tamil and Muslim youth. The new recruitments will be made from the Northern and Eastern provinces. Interviews to recruit police constables and women police constables commenced today at the Police Superintendentâ€™s Office of Vavuniya. The police highlighted that the response of the youth to the initiative is overwhelming and many have attended the interviews enthusiastically. According to Assistant Superintendent of Police, Y G S Pinnaduwa, both educational qualifications and physical fitness are tested during the interviews.
